En latin, pomum (neutre singulier) est le ¬´ fruit d'un arbre, fruit √† p√©pins ou √† noyau ¬ª dont le radical pom- se retrouve dans Pomone, la d√©esse des fruits. En latin classique, la pomme est appel√©e malum (qui a donn√© mail en romanche, mela en italien et mƒÉr en roumain). Le mot pomme a remplac√© malum car la pomme demeure le fruit, le pomum, par excellence. En revanche, le sens g√©n√©ral de ¬´ fruit ¬ª s'est perp√©tu√© longtemps, comme en t√©moignent les noms de pomme de terre, de pomme de jacque, de pomme d'orange ou encore de pomme de pin ou pomme cannelle. Commands for server management

Commands:
  forceaccountnames Automatically change nicknames to in-game names
  timezone          Change the timezone bot will use in this server.

Type $server command for more info on a command.
You can also type $server category for more info on a category. $server timezone. $server timezone <offset from UTC>

Change the timezone bot will use in this server.
Affects various commands

Enter value as offset from UTC. UTC is 0.

 for PST
 for CET. $server timezone +2. Timezone set. $et. . ^^. $character gear Osstean. . Presque tout vip√©rin :). Y a pas de +9 sur ton amulette :p. This patch we‚Äôre overhauling throwables, continuing to tune weapon and attachment balance, and shipping a whole mess of performance improvements. 

First, let‚Äôs share a little context about the changes to throwables:

Frag grenades: In a recent update we removed the frag grenade‚Äôs knockback effect, greatly reducing its potential impact. To restore the trusty frag‚Äôs killing power we‚Äôre buffing its effective range and its damage.
Stun grenades: Stun grenades have never been the most popular pickups, and recent changes to frag grenade audio effects have made them feel a bit redundant. To make stun grenades more rewarding, they‚Äôll now affect stunned players‚Äô vision, hearing, and their ability to shoot accurately. We‚Äôre also bumping up the stun grenade‚Äôs effective radius and introducing new animations so it‚Äôs possible to tell when your grenades have stunned opponents. 
Molotovs: These have traditionally been among the least popular items in the game. To make molotovs more useful, we‚Äôre increasing their area of effect, introducing new properties that allow fire to spread along walls and wooden surfaces in houses, and imposing new debuffs on players who catch on fire. Molotovs will also now explode when shot mid-air.

One last thing before we jump into the patch notes: we‚Äôre nerfing the M24, removing it from care packages, and adding it into the world spawn loot tables. Our goal is to make it a viable alternative to the Kar98k (that players actually get to use). As always, we‚Äôll keep an eye on all of these balance changes and continuously make adjustments and improvements.". Statistic related commands

Commands:
  server Statistics of this server
  user   Statistics of the user

Type $stats command for more info on a command.
You can also type $stats category for more info on a category. $stats death. $[statistics|stats]

Statistic related commands

Commands:
  server Statistics of this server
  user   Statistics of the user

Type $stats command for more info on a command.
You can also type $stats category for more info on a category. $stats user. . $help. $help me ! No command called "me" found. $character. $character

Character related commands

Commands:
  attributes   Lists attributes of given character
  birthdays    Lists days until the next birthday for each of your characters.
  build        Displays the build of given character
  crafting     Displays your characters and their crafting level
  gear         Displays the gear of given character
  info         Info about the given character
  list         Lists all your characters
  pvpbuild     Displays the build of given character
  togglepublic Toggle your character's (or all of them) status to public
  wvwbuild     Displays the build of given character

Type $character command for more info on a command.
You can also type $character category for more info on a category. $character info. $character info <character>

Info about the given character
You must be the owner of the character.

If you alternate every other day, then it takes twice as long to level up. If the player that is ahead opens first, they gain 1 point. But if the player that is behind opens first, they gain points equal to the difference.

Fastest method is to let the same player open the first gift each day, then after hitting the next level let the other player open the first gift the next day which will bring them up to match. Non je pense que c'est la dur√©e de la partie. C'est quand m√™me un peu nul Batch... Je viens de passer une bonne dizaine de minutes √† chercher comment faire pour avoir un argument dans une variable d'environnement pour pouvoir faire un truc du genre :
bat
if condition ( set TOTO=--option )
programme %TOTO%

Et bien √©videmment, √ßa va fonctionner si la condition est vrai, mais √ßa va litt√©ralement appeler  sans toucher √† la variable si la condition est fausse... Et si tu fais  √ßa appelle ...

Pour info la solution batch, c'est d'utiliser un pr√©fixe inutile √† tes variables, que tu peux ensuite virer en utiliser  pour couper le premier caract√®re par exemple. √áa donne un truc du genre :
bat
if condition ( set TOTO=0--option ) else ( set TOTO=0 )
programme %TOTO:~1%


Evidemment la meilleure solution ici est d'utiliser Powershell plut√¥t que ce putain de batch de merde :
ps

Commands showing daily things

Commands:
  all      Show today's all dailies
  fractals Show today's fractal dailies
  psna     Show today's Pact Supply Network Agent locations
  pve      Show today's PvE dailies
  pvp      Show today's PvP dailies
  wvw      Show today's WvW dailies

Type $help command for more info on a command.
You can also type $help category for more info on a category. $daily fractals. . . Gw2  fractales are back(wards). $daily fractals. . >***Multiplayer (still in a bit funky state but it‚Äôs Playable and Fun‚Ñ¢)***. Also l'avis d'un des cr√©ateurs de Factorio
>>> From the point of a player I would say that the trailer looks amazing. The energy of it, the looks, the potential, the promise is fantastic. I don't doubt that our office will be playing from day 0 once it is released. Let me quote /u/european_impostor by saying: "They've certainly talked the talk, now let's see if they can walk the walk".
From the point of a Factorio developer, I would say that it makes me proud and insecure at the same time. As the game is undoubtedly inspired by Factorio, it makes me proud that we most probably helped to make this "genre" become a thing. It makes me insecure as well, as it could also completely overshadow our game. To that, I would say, that if they managed to do a game that is better then Factorio on every level, then they deserve it. If there are still going to be areas where Factorio is better, the potential success of the game can actually help us, as when more people come to play the game, more people will eventually look for alternatives in the similar way as the people asking for "other games like Factorio" from time to time. En tout cas si jamais, lorsque le multi sera un peu plus stabilis√©, des gens veulent essayer, prevenez moi üòÉ. Rien n'est mandatory, et il suffit d'aller dans la zone pour le d√©bloquer. Donc si c'est ton seul frein, quelques tp √† un ami et c'est r√©gl√©. Commands showing daily things

Commands:
  all      Show today's all dailies
  fractals Show today's fractal dailies
  psna     Show today's Pact Supply Network Agent locations
  pve      Show today's PvE dailies
  pvp      Show today's PvP dailies
  wvw      Show today's WvW dailies

Type $help command for more info on a command.
You can also type $help category for more info on a category. $daily fractals. . Commands showing daily things

Commands:
  all      Show today's all dailies
  fractals Show today's fractal dailies
  psna     Show today's Pact Supply Network Agent locations
  pve      Show today's PvE dailies
  pvp      Show today's PvP dailies
  wvw      Show today's WvW dailies

Type $help command for more info on a command.
